Items.Title: Application number C 240250 ZMQ (102-51 Queens Boulevard Rezoning) submitted by QBM Properties, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 14a, eliminating from within an existing R7-1 District a C1-2 District, changing from an R7-1 District to an R8X district, and establishing within the proposed R8X District a C2-4 District, Borough of Queens, Community District 6, Council District 29.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, 102-51 Queens Boulevard Rezoning, Queens (C 240250 ZMQ).

Items.Title: Application number N 240251 ZRQ (102-51 Queens Boulevard) submitted by QBM Properties, LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Queens, Community District 6, Council District 29.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application number C 240250 ZMQ (102-51 Queens Boulevard Rezoning) submitted by QBM Properties, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 14a, eliminating from within an existing R7-1 District a C1-2 District, changing from an R7-1 District to an R8X district, and establishing within the proposed R8X District a C2-4 District, Borough of Queens, Community District 6, Council District 29.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Zoning, 102-51 Queens Boulevard Rezoning, Queens (C 240250 ZMQ).

Items.Title: Application number N 240251 ZRQ (102-51 Queens Boulevard) submitted by QBM Properties, LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Queens, Community District 6, Council District 29.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
